entry.title: [MRS/SGP][Backbone] - Packet loss
entry.content:
Jul 2, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 01/07/2022 22:11 UTC
End time : 02/07/2022 01:18 UTC
Service impact : We were facing packet loss in Singapore and Sydney.
Root cause : Fiber optics cable cut

Jul 2, 09:17 UTC
Monitoring - Service Status: Partner provider found a dual route failure on a segment since 22:10 UTC 01/07/2022. Fiber optics cable cut detected at 26 Kms from NBS towards WNS. Fiber splicing completed and route has been recovered.
Ongoing actions : All alarms are cleared at 01:18 UTC 01/07/2022 and services are under monitoring.

Jul 2, 00:41 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams continue to work on the problem in collaboration with our operator in order to fix the problem.

Jul 1, 23:04 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : We aren't experiencing any packet loss at the moment. But some latency is observed.
Our teams are still working on the problem.

Jul 1, 22:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/07/2022 22:11 UTC
Service impact : We are facing packet loss in Singapore and Sydney
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
